section.p: Charging notification EDRs are generated as a result of notification events in the Charging application. The deviceIdtag indicates that the notification is for device and the groupID tag indicates that the notification is for group.

fig.codeblock: CDR length: 376 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 4 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 OCSNotificationRecord requestType 1 UPDATE_REQUEST entityId 1 D65504 entityType 1 Device deviceId 1 devi12 notificationTemplateId 1 Notification_Template_demo notificationTemplateParams 1 {getAvCurrentValue=5120} sessionId 1 1-1-65504 sessionSequenceNumber 1 1 recipientId 1 User65504 generationTimestamp 1 20/07/2018 10:25:46 RecordTimestamp 1 20/07/2018 04:55:46
